professional_summary: Results-driven Digital Marketing Manager with 10 years of progressive experience  developing and executing data-driven marketing strategies that drive revenue growth.  Proven track record of increasing brand awareness by 250%, achieving 185% ROI on ad  spend, and managing cross-channel campaigns with budgets exceeding $2.5M annually.  Expert in SEO/SEM, content marketing, marketing automation, and team leadership.

work_experience.description:
→ Spearhead integrated digital marketing strategies for 15+ B2B/B2C clients across  SaaS, e-commerce, and healthcare industries with combined annual revenue of $45M+

→ Increased client organic traffic by average of 340% through comprehensive SEO  strategy including technical audits, content optimization, and link building

→ Manage team of 8 marketing specialists (content writers, PPC specialists, social  media managers, graphic designers) with focus on professional development

→ Achieved average ROAS (Return on Ad Spend) of 5.2:1 across Google Ads and Meta  campaigns, managing monthly ad spend of $185K across all client accounts

→ Developed and implemented marketing automation workflows resulting in 67% increase  in lead nurturing efficiency and 43% improvement in lead-to-customer conversion

→ Present monthly performance reports and strategic recommendations to C-suite  executives and key stakeholders

Key Achievement: Launched rebranding campaign for major client that resulted in  215% increase in brand awareness and $3.2M in new business within 6 months

→ Led digital marketing initiatives for B2B SaaS company serving enterprise clients

→ Grew marketing qualified leads (MQLs) by 290% YoY through multi-channel demand  generation campaigns including content marketing, webinars, and paid advertising

→ Reduced customer acquisition cost (CAC) by 38% while simultaneously increasing  monthly recurring revenue (MRR) by $425K

→ Built and managed company's first marketing automation system using HubSpot,  creating 25+ automated workflows and email sequences

→ Established company blog that grew to 85K monthly visitors, ranking #1 for 50+  targeted keywords in competitive SaaS space

→ Collaborated with Sales team to develop account-based marketing (ABM) strategy  targeting Fortune 500 companies, resulting in 12 new enterprise deals worth $2.8M

→ Managed external agencies and freelancers for specialized projects (video  production, graphic design, content writing)

• Directed all marketing activities for fast-growing e-commerce startup with 200+ SKUs
• Implemented data-driven email marketing strategy that generated $1.2M in revenue  with average email open rate of 28% and CTR of 4.5% (150% above industry average)
• Launched successful influencer marketing program partnering with 40+ micro-influencers,  reaching combined audience of 2.5M and driving $650K in attributed sales
• Increased social media following from 15K to 180K across Instagram, Facebook, and  TikTok through consistent content strategy and community engagement
• Managed $450K annual marketing budget across paid search, social, display, and affiliate channels

• Executed PPC campaigns across Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social platforms for 20+ clients
• Managed monthly ad budgets ranging from $10K to $85K with average CTR of 3.8%
• Conducted keyword research, ad copywriting, landing page optimization, and bid management
• Created monthly performance reports and presented insights to clients
• Achieved average client retention rate of 92%

• Supported senior marketing team with campaign execution and administrative tasks
• Managed social media accounts and created content calendar
• Coordinated marketing events and trade show participation

publications.title: The Future of AI in Marketing

volunteer_experience.description: Pro bono marketing consulting for local startups and small businesses
